{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3221757,"name":"Yongle Liu","username":"yle","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/yle/{size}/194482_2.png","created_at":"2023-07-29T08:43:53.846Z","cooked":"

Hi guys we are preparing for the off season, and we would like to modify the fonts on our bumpers. I’m using Inventor to design the bumper styles and I’d like to learn what fonts do you recommend? Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":33,"updated_at":"2023-07-29T08:43:53.846Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":764,"reads":667,"readers_count":666,"score":3983.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":439356,"topic_slug":"what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers","display_username":"Yongle Liu","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":59397,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mech/Code Designer"},"post_url":"/t/what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers/439356/1","custom_user_title":"Mech/Code Designer","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3221763,"name":"Ken Pontbriant","username":"electroken","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/electroken/{size}/160387_2.png","created_at":"2023-07-29T11:49:38.726Z","cooked":"

The font we use and the font I would recommend are not the same font. For nearly our entire existence we’ve used a font named Boink LET:

image585×740 35 KB

It’s easily visible and pretty much a defining trait for our team by now.

The font I would recommend is any non-serif font that meets the requirements of this past season, so unbroken characters with a stroke width of at least 1/2".

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":33,"updated_at":"2023-07-29T11:49:38.726Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":7,"reads":662,"readers_count":661,"score":302.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":439356,"topic_slug":"what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers","display_username":"Ken Pontbriant","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/uploads/default/original/3X/7/9/79471bd22700c6c76a71c0d06e48bff75668d0f8.jpeg","internal":true,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":9}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17612,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 230 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers/439356/2","custom_user_title":"FRC 230 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":9}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":9,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3221774,"name":"Billfred Leverette (he/him/not Bill)","username":"Billfred","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/billfred/{size}/225278_2.png","created_at":"2023-07-29T14:29:26.581Z","cooked":"

We had someone make our numbers this year and last year for us to heat press on, so I don’t know what exactly they used. Looks like a variation of Arial that I can’t clock, like Arial Bold but with more rounded corners.

IMG_15261920×1440 364 KB

IMG_02061920×2560 515 KB

2815 and 4901 used variations of ITC Machine for most of my time with them, driven by trying to ape the stylings of the Gamecocks’ athletics department of the time. (Garnet Squadron’s was lightly customized at the 4 and used a completely custom 0, which I’d edit further if they were still active to remove the inner stroke to remove any doubt that it’s a numeral and not “a logo”.)

IMG_21701920×1440 253 KB

IMG_00511920×1440 280 KB

Honestly, find something that works with your team’s style and run with it.

you should come to SCRIW in October"},"post_url":"/t/what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers/439356/3","custom_user_title":"says you should come to SCRIW in October","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3221777,"name":"Stewart Riley","username":"Strategic","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/strategic/{size}/10157_2.png","created_at":"2023-07-29T14:37:25.120Z","cooked":"

We’ve been using the same font for a couple of years now, mostly because it’s actually one of the official branding fonts of FIRST, partially because of its utterly appropriate name, and partially because it’s just a great font for bumper numbers: Roboto. We use it in its bold, italic form to get a solid but kind of racy look to the numbers. Since we cut them on a vinyl cutter from insignia cloth, we can apply them as a group to the bumpers and get a perfect alignment and spacing. We think they look great and they’re certainly easy to read for refs and announcers. Here’s this season’s robot, Charles, with these numbers:

Charles Ready to Start the First Match at States1280×1252 266 KB

Years ago we used some variant of the Twitch font. It was awkward.
I looked for a font with the “open top” 4. Personally don’t like the closed 4.
Found this: SF Transrobotics Font | dafont.com
Use it on our shirts, bumpers, banners, etc. May have changed height of numbers for bumpers, but like the look.

DriveTeamLA1920×1243 314 KB

After our rookie year we formed our branding around Myriad Pro Bold Italic.

We use a modified custom font “Bauer” - it’s based on the logo for the hockey company. Our version is modified to be correctly kerned for our team name and numbers.

PXL_20230311_2003296281920×2550 373 KB

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":33,"updated_at":"2023-07-29T17:19:16.179Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":7,"reads":490,"readers_count":489,"score":163.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":439356,"topic_slug":"what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers","display_username":"Brennan Macaig","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/uploads/default/original/3X/a/c/ac59b440b6f0aa6b1737c09d4a29b59d7f2e4a5d.jpeg","internal":true,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":27431,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FTAA/CSA, first alum, 6324 mentor [he/him]"},"post_url":"/t/what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers/439356/7","custom_user_title":"FTAA/CSA, first alum, 6324 mentor [he/him]","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3221792,"name":"","username":"ctxy256","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ctxy256/{size}/217543_2.png","created_at":"2023-07-29T17:24:14.352Z","cooked":"

We’ve used Hemi Head Bold-Italic as our main font since 2011 (I don’t believe we had any specific font in 2010). We use it as our main logo font on our shirts, promotional/media items, our bumpers, etc.
We normally embroider on the letters, but this year we decided to use vinyl and heat press them on, (something that’d become very handy later in the season).

Taken from our Visual Identity Guide:

image1421×923 128 KB

Some examples:

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":33,"updated_at":"2023-07-29T17:24:14.352Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":11,"reads":482,"readers_count":481,"score":216.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":439356,"topic_slug":"what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://typodermicfonts.com/return-of-the-hemi-head-muscle-font/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":10},{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/uploads/default/original/3X/b/c/bc2caf974bc30629cd71d6d2085b0f3e370bd4d5.png","internal":true,"reflection":false,"clicks":0}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55538,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3161 Alumni 2021-25 | CUFIRST"},"post_url":"/t/what-fonts-do-you-use-on-your-bumpers/439356/8","custom_user_title":"3161 Alumni 2021-25 | CUFIRST","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3221800,"name":"Ankur Raghavan","username":"Ankur-Raghavan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ankur-raghavan/{size}/207141_2.png","created_at":"2023-07-29T18:37:09.838Z","cooked":"

We used to use whatever stickers we bought, but now we have switched to Edge of the Galaxy, the font on our shirts, and other branding.

image1920×2560 668 KB

3128 uses Daggersquare

IMG_35713024×4032 1.54 MB

We tried our hardest to match 1114s font but wanted something easily accessible so we eventually settled on Roboto Black Italicized.
